title: Atrophy of hippocampal subfields and amygdala nuclei in subjects with mild cognitive impairment progressing to Alzheimer's disease
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Miriam Punzi, Carlo Sestieri, Eleonora Picerni, Antonio Maria Chiarelli, Caterina Padulo, Andrea Delli Pizzi, Maria Giulia Tullo, Annalisa Tosoni, Alberto Granzotto, Stefania Della Penna, Marco Onofrj, Antonio Ferretti, Stefano Delli Pizzi, Stefano L.
